instruction: Identify which of the following statements about the Titanic is true.
input:
The Titanic was the largest recorded ship built, with a gross register tonnage of 46,328 tons.

It had twice the horsepower of the next largest ship.

It was the longest triple-decker ever constructed.

It was the largest triple-decker ever constructed.
output: The Titanic was the largest recorded ship built, with a gross register tonnage of 46,328 tons and was also the longest triple-decker ever constructed.
